FILE: cm645740v11.0.txt
DYAD: IRAQ - JAPAN
RIVALRY: RIV1236
DISPUTE(S): MID621 
RIVALRY: RIV1237
DISPUTE(S): MID3971 

PS-NOTES:

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20190311
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20190311

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

WWII MIDs: MID621

MID3971 

TERRMID: MID3971 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID3971 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID3971 1 -- third party link to territorial MID
TERRLINK-CER: MID3971 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: MID3971 from Gibler 2018, in 1991 Iraq threatened Japan that if they sent military support to assist the coalition of states fighting to expel Iraq from Kuwait, it would be attacked by Iraq. Coded third party link to territorial MID because this was connected to the Gulf War in which Iraq was attempting to annex Kuwait. 

MARITMID: MID3971 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID3971 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID3971 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID3971 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID3971 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID3971 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID3971 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID3971 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID3971 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID3971 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID3971 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID3971 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

RIVNOTES: 

NARRATIVE-CM:

SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield.
